entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable regions with NativeAOT #65470
    7.0.0
  • GetGCMemoryInfo.TotalAvailableMemoryBytes returns negative value on ARM32 #65466
  • [wasm] Tracking issue for issues caused by the emscripten bump to 2.0.34 #65464
  • Escape analysis inconsistency #65463
  • Consider settings startup environment variables in runtimeConfig.json #65457
  • .NET 5 in Surface Hub devices #65456
  • SslStream tests can hit Assert and fail completely #65455
    7.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildInvalidSignatureTwice failure #65448
  • A heap has been corrupted using PublishSingleFile #65443
  • Enable Mariner 2.0 DEPS package #65441
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Missing implementation for `LocalCertificateSelectionCallback` #65439
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] make emscripten symbols exportable #65436
    7.0.0
  • NamedPipeClientStream sometimes throws FileNotFoundException #65434
  • No access to public Azure feeds? #65430
  • [wasm] Support fetch response streaming on NodeJS #65429
    Future
  • `PublishReadyToRun` with `PublishSingleFile` in linux-arm Blazor Server causes program to crash with "Uncaught Error: No interop methods are registered for renderer 0" #65424
    6.0.x
  • Use createdump to collect crash dumps for libraries tests #65422
  • RevokeEndEntityWithInvalidRevocationName failed #65421
  • The value returned by AsQueryable().FirstOrDefault is different between Net5.0 and Net6.0 #65419
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.ConstructorTests_Metadata.MultipleThreadsLooping #65418
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexKnownPatternTests.PatternsDataSet_ConstructRegexForAll_NonBacktracking #65417
  • Test failure CoreXml.Test.XLinq.XNodeReaderFunctionalTests.RunTests #65416
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Popcnt\\Popcnt_ro\\Popcnt_ro.cmd #65415
  • Calling Win32 API CreateNamedPipe fails with ERROR_NOACCESS with PublishReadyToRun #65412
    7.0.0

Closed

  • checked corerun annoyances #62760
  • CLA checks are stuck in Pending #65437
  • Is there a way to read certificates from .p12 file and use them for an SSL/TLS communication while using SSLStreams? #65402
  • Loading issue when RID is linux-musl-x64 on Alpine 3.15 #65152
  • [API Proposal]: ConcurrentBag AddRange method #61291
  • [Feature Request] cross-platform data protection #62748
    Future
  • Writing an efficient custom AsyncMethodBuilder is too hard #63125
    Future
  • Error Publishing Blazor WebAssembly app using AOT Compilation #63360
    7.0.0
  • Find a way to get data from embedded resource without reflection #63488
    Future
  • Minimal record definition with camel case deserialization uses Pascal Case #63542
  • System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoStream looses content, decrypting an encrypted string is now shorter than the original unencrypted string #65440
  • Some Cryptography tests fail on RHEL 9 arm64. #64816
  • Value cannot be null. r nParameter name: content ..IHttpActionResult #65433
  • Assertion failed '!"Write to unaliased local overlaps outstanding read"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' (IL size 7) #65307
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Win32.Registry nuget package still at 5.0.0 #65428
  • Slow file access times when accessing NFS server #48757
    7.0.0
  • FreeBSD: System.Drawing.Printing tests are failing #23786
    Future
  • FreeBSD tests fail to build on Windows 10. Suspect is System.Private.mscorlib.dll #9487
    Future
  • Impact of changing MaxDegreeOfParallelism while running Parallel methods #65410
  • [mono] gshared calls to non-generic static virtual interface method throw BadImageFormatException: Method has no body #65384
    7.0.0
  • GCGenerationRange events missing from Generation Aware Analysis on Linux #64390
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Cache aotdata file in AOTCompiler task #65472
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [IGNORE] [wasm] testing the 3.11 bump #65471
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • FIX | Adds support for Shim gss api on Linux to delay loading libgssapi_krb… #65469
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: better addressing mode for floating point on arm64 #65468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix --break #65467
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Avoid additional AssemblyInfo output file #65465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Always dispose inner stream in StreamPipeWriter.Complete* #65462
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Add FlagsAttribute to GC_ALLOC_FLAGS #65461
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • PGO: Profile isinst/castclass #65460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Compute the type of generic context used by static virtua… #65459
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Forward DefaultDllImportSearchPathsAttribute to the inner P/Invoke. #65458
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Disable component governance for musl runs #65454
  • Remove or move some expensive low-value testing #65453
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add partial to the enclosing types when running the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport fixer #65452
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Trigger all wasm jobs, if `eng/Version.Details.xml` has any chan… #65451
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Perform type/layout verification on some mono-config elements to avoid silent failures or crashes later #65449
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Class types with layout that inherit from System.Object should be ManagedSequential #65447
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [MonoAPI] Split type and function headers, add MONO_API_FUNCTION macro #65446
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono] Fix OP_FMAX an OP_FMIN on amd64 and lift the overly restricted architecture limitation #65445
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add "[createdump]" prefix to all createdump output and logging for VS4Mac #65444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable Mariner 2.0 DEPS package #65442
    area-Infrastructure-installer, 7.0.0
  • Added Not, Sqrt, Negate vector intrinsics #65438
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove OpenSSL error queue checking in SslInitializer #65435
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Clear GC info when consuming GT_PUTARG_SPLIT nodes #65432
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize the Regex source generator's handling of `Compilation` objects. #65431
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Move MacCatalyst arm64 leg definitions from runtime-staging to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #65427
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix verification of open delegates #65425
    area-ILVerification
  • Fix PerformanceCounter's when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #65414
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • [wasm] Disable aot tests failing due to OOM #65413
    arch-wasm, wasm-aot-test

Merged

  • [MAUI][PERF] Reenable Maui w/o package injection #65409
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] add gc directory for LoongArch64. #63071
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Merge a couple NativeAOT smoke tests #65426
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] add the `coreclr/unwinder/loongarch64` from the #62979. #63489
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for ref field support #63659
    area-System.Runtime
  • Gracefully emit a diagnostic when the GeneratedDllImport attribute didn't parse quite right and we don't have a valid AttributeData object #65344
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add linux-musl entry for FALLBACK_HOST_RID #65339
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Separate capturing from normal states in NonBacktracking #65340
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Explicitly check for TTL expiration when using Ping utility #65312
    area-System.Net
  • Hosting: ConfigDoesReload tests: increase timeout. #64976
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • JIT: Consider local var reads to be outstanding only if they are values #65309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Suppress warnings in NativeAOT smoke tests #65423
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable core dumps when running libraries tests on macOS #65405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport code-fix to support stripping out PreserveSig and transforming the signature when PreserveSig was set to true #65169
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [mini] fix static virtual constrained calls in non-generic interfaces #65390
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Make sure we have GCGenerationRanges events when using Generation-Aware analysis on Linux #65338
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Generate 300 band Mono.Toolchain manifest #65308
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Send CA names on Linux and OSX #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix Vector256.IsHardwareAccelerated in R2R binaries #65351
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] Rationalize wasm jobs run on CI #65035
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] HTTP tests on NodeJS #65303
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use `--emit-symbol-map` to generate a `dotnet.js.symbols` #65162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Expand indirection cell calls in IR instead of doing ad-hoc optimizations in codegen #65388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Fix minor random bias #65404
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Fix Type.IsPublic for pointer and byref types #65156
    area-System.Reflection
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement StringWriter composite formatting overloads. #65241
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • NetworkAddressChange.Unix: use async Socket API to wait for events. #64614
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [JIT] More ARM64 comparison instruction optimizations with Vector.Zero #64783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use `push` for 8/12 byte struct args on x86 #65387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI] Add startup time and size mesauresments for dotnet-podcast app #65398
  • [WIP] Heuristic change for double constant adjustment #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Unroll Equals and StartsWith for constant strings and spans. [0..32] chars #65288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 and 9 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating wasm stack traces via XHarness #65167
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [DRAFT] Add MonoApi runtime tests #65221
    * NO MERGE *
  • Remove ExactSpelling from GeneratedDllImport #65343
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Run debugger test in codespace #64746
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add a transport package with libmono-profiler-aot.so on Android #65401
    area-Build-mono
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Changes to reduce committed memory: #65367
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add checks for interpreter stack overflow. #65315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [EventPipe] Fix reverse connection socket leaking to child processes. #65365
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • FileSystemWatcher.Linux: handle races while adding child directories. #64906
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Process.Unix: reap all processes when running as pid 1. #65061
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Fix remaining COM warnings in crossgen2 #65297
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • fix few Filesystem tests on FreeBSD #65059
    area-System.IO, os-freebsd, test enhancement
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Deduplicate some HWI codegen code #65302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove condition that forbids promotion of HFAs with CUSTOMLAYOUT flag #64863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SSA def descriptors in copy propagation #65250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Draft for x ^ 0 opt (#65071) #65072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not number partial definitions and `ARGPLACE` nodes #64898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Handle direct addresses for statics in `IsFieldAddr` #64846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Move IsKnownConstant handling to ExtendedDefaultPolicy #64809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix missing zero-offset sequences and add checking #64805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • update SSL tests to deal better with disabled protocols #65120
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Core SDK 6.0.200: Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis, Version=4.1.0.0' #23972
  • Trailing \ or / will fail for path parameters for `dotnet test` #23970
  • "[XmlException] Data at the root level is invalid" at xml app.config read since .Net6 #23964

Closed

  • error CS8983: A 'struct' with field initializers must include an explicitly declared constructor. #23971
  • .Net SDK 6.0 RC2 Missing error message when dotnet test can't find older, targeted framework #22311
  • Opening a SDK-style project in VS 2022 Preview fails with error about version mismatch of Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten #23929
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Update 6.0.3xx with the 6.0.200 version of files #23977
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update some test package versions #23976
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Next set of three test projects to move to Helix. #23975
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Annotate content items for web projects with a special attribute #23973
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Update source-build dependency to source-build-externals #23928
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Reverse versions in error message #23748
    Area-Workloads
  • [Razor] Fix some pack tests and skip a failing test #22631
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix typo in UIChoice.cs #23945

Updated

  • Allow `dotnet sln list` to display solution folder paths #18502
    Area-CLI
  • dotnet sln: Add error message for misplaced solution argument #18608
    Area-CLI
  • Rename "NetSdkManaged" types to "FileBased" #23955
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1615779 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • reenable composite r2r singlefile test on OSX #23934
    Area-SingleFile
  • Update CODEOWNERS #23956
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Open question for shadowing field keyword in semi auto property #5703
  • Open question for semi-auto properties #5563

Updated

  • [Open issue]: static abstract interfaces and static classes #5783
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Practical existential types for interfaces #5556
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Delegate Type Arguments Improvements #5321
    Backlog
  • Proposal: User-defined positional patterns #4131
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Checked Operators #4665
    Working Set
  • Definite Assignment in Struct Constructors #5737

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add missing `!!` in sample #5789

Updated

  • Update links to the spec documents to point to the ECMA standard draft #5739

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Indenting a raw string literal breaks it when a line starts with different whitespace than the IDE indents with #59594
  • The IDE interferes with typing a new raw string literal #59593
  • "Convert to raw string" fixer which removes indentation and initial blank line from the string value #59591
  • Ctrl+Left/Right Arrow inside raw string literals does not behave as expected #59581
    17.2
  • Issues with formatting and whitespace around !! annotation #59580
  • Change Inline Hints shortcut/behavior to be Ctrl+Ctrl with a toggle like behavior #59579
    Backlog
  • Roslyn suggests conflicting IDE0044/IDE0064 code fixes #59577
    Backlog
  • SDK Update from 6.0.102 to 6.0.200 breaks C# from JSON generation in MSBuild context #59590

Closed

  • `args` in top-level program should be colored as a contextual keyword. #59569
    17.2
  • Disabled including binaries for generators in latest .net sdk preview #59209
    17.2
  • Type inference fails for Func<Expression<Func<T>>> #57517
    17.1
  • IDE0017 suggestion breaks on field cross-reference #59576
    17.2
  • Test AsyncIteratorWithAwaitAndYieldAndAwait is flaky #57797
    17.2
  • `CSharpAddParameterCheckCodeRefactoringProvider` doesn't respect `PreferParameterNullChecking` #59559
    17.2
  • List patterns: no error is emitted when Length is missing or inaccessible #59465
    17.2
  • Gold bar trying to show light bulb #47640
    17.2
  • Misspellings in CodeLens in 'ru' localization #59020
  • Null-checking nullable param warning should be relaxed #59226
    17.2
  • The pre-selected "Suggest Name" for parameters has inconistent casing and violates .editorconfig #59562

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix DateTime completion appearing innapropriately #59592
    Area-IDE
  • Move VisualStudioProject.BatchingDocumentCollection to it's own file #59589
    Area-IDE
  • Backport "Remove handling of certain BCL binaries from our build" to 17.0 #59588
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port more tests #59587
    Area-IDE
  • Remove potential partial snapshot in codefixservice #59586
    Area-IDE
  • Allow codefixservice to stream codefixes as it is computed, instead of waiting for all fixes to be ready. #59585
    Area-IDE
  • Compute fixes by order of fixers, so we don't have to sort them after #59584
    Area-IDE
  • Print method name in ILVerify output #59583
    Area-Compilers
  • Propagate CodeActionOptions through fix all #59575
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • [LSP] Use runtime type arguments for streamjsonrpc request handling #59510
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Colorize 'args' in top-level program #59574
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Handle binary AdditionalTexts in the AdditionalTextComparer. #59578
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Fix typos #59237
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • CodeFixService simplifications #59582
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update breaking changes document for 17.0 struct initializer fixes #59245
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • [17.0] Report errors for structs with missing field initializers and implicit parameterless constructor #59055
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Move global options to EditorFeature layer #59071
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Respect PreferParameterNullChecking user option #59561
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59572
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • List-patterns: report error when no suitable length member #59475
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, Next
  • Rename Basic to Visual Basic in Visual Studio options page #53134
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringLiterals #59570
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Support parsing of checked user-defined operator declarations #59504
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Handle nullability attributes in param-nullchecking #59393
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59595
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59597
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59596
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update Parser.md #56987
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Format list patterns #57568
    Area-IDE
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Try to reuse previously parsed trees when changing parse options #59406
    Area-IDE
  • Value Tracking: Remove inproc symbol usage #59473
    Area-IDE
  • Diagnostic incremental analyzer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor indentation API #57529
    Area-IDE
  • Address feedback from previous pattern matching ReadOnlySpan<char> change #59451
    Area-Compilers
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE
  • Add external access APIs for O# #59469
    Area-IDE
  • Produce better error for members in top-level main #59321
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Consolidate data tracked over an async completion session #59553
    Area-IDE
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid loading assemblies that only contain IDE analyzers #59554
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Seemingly Useless Encryption on Cookie Value #40275
  • Microsoft.Data.SqlClient updated to 4.0.1 #40273
    Discussions
  • InvokeAsync<IJSObjectReference?>() call does not return when js value is null or undefined #40272
  • Host stopped and disposed twice when WebApplicationFactory<> is used with the minimal api #40271
  • Intermittent System.NullReferenceException thrown at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.Filters.SaveTempDataFilter.OnStarting #40267
  • BACKROUND SERVICE IN ASP.NET CORE #40266
  • Dynamic routing #40265
  • HotReload displays WebSocket connection error message in browser console for ASP.NET Core app run in VS2022 but not on dotnet watch run #40264
  • Simplify virtualize in flex by setting flex-shrink:0 on placeholders automatically #40262
  • Error boundaries are not catching all exceptions #40260
  • Can't Use IJSRuntime.InvokeVoidAsync to Call JavaScript Arrow Function #40258

Closed

  • The result of identity passwordsigninasync() returns false, Prompt invalid password for user in the console #40270
    Discussions
  • SignInManager.GetTwoFactorAuthenticationUserAsync() returns null if called after a long wait after calling PasswordSignInAsync() #40240
  • Crash on "Register" and "Log In" #40024
  • SQL Connection hang issue with .Net 5 and Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.SqlServer 5.0.1 #40207
    7.0-preview3
  • JwtSecurityTokenHandler will always create IsAuthorized = true for whatever claims we pass #40256
  • blazor: Virtualize does not respond to items with CSS Flex #40123
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Server - Ambiguous Routes when changing Base Path #40243
  • [.Net 6.0.102] dotnet pack - Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.StaticWebAssets.targets NotFoundException #40196

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to preview3 #40276
    area-infrastructure
  • Ensure `AccessToken` is not trimmed away #40274
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui Blazor Hybrid and authentication #4731
  • Add BlazorWebView to the WPF toolbox #4730
  • Spans with FontAttributes do not render on Android #4729
  • New Maui solution, AppDelegate intellisense issues #4726
  • Setup a repository of apps that we can run via CI to test certain integration scenarios #4725
  • Grid within a Grid is not size constrained correctly #4724
  • ViewCell DataTemplate doesn't work in a Release build #4723
  • Separate Core MAUI platform and Native Controls #4721
  • Multiple Microsoft.Maui.*.dll's map same type name to the same xmlns #4720
  • ListView Margins inside ViewCells on P13 are broken #4719
  • CSS Isolation still failing builds for target iOS / macOS #4717
  • OnPlatform could be simplified at build time #4716
  • [Windows] AutomationId does not work for ContentView, Layouts and controls that inherit them #4715
  • [Android] AutomationId no longer works #4714
  • Add IsVisible to TableSection #4711

Closed

  • IElement ambiguous reference #4225
  • Android Labels don't overflow #4487
  • microsoft.netcore.app.runtime.mono.android-arm.msi.x64 missing version #4701
  • [Bug] Automatic Event Creation is not working as expected #2080
  • [Bug] Frame is not rendered if the Frame.IsClippedToBounds property is set to true #2135
  • InitializeComponent should cache the same Uris #4642
  • Blazor Desktop tenets: Global readiness #2532
  • Include Signing Key to MAUI project #4700
  • [Bug] Android back button doesnt work on .NET MAUI blazor app #2835
  • Android platform press back button crash #4712
  • [Android] MAUI app breaks Android 8 launcher #4598
  • ScrollView inside a StackLayout doesn't Scroll #3655
  • [Android] DatePicker popup shows empty view #4254
  • [Windows] Wrong positions using AbsoluteLayout #4075
  • [Android] Wrong positions using AbsoluteLayout #4074
  • [Windows] Horizontal CollectionView using a GridLayout not rendering #4111
  • Unable to download packages after create a new project #4550
  • [Bug]Debugger Stops attaching to iOS build after few cycles. #2996

PullRequests

Created

  • Annotate web Content items to avoid workarounds in Xamarin and iOS SDKs #4728
  • Essentials.Vibration refactored to interface and singleton #4727
  • Use unelevated button style on Android #4722
  • Move build targets to the targets folder #4709

Merged

  • Initial set of FabricBot rules for issue/PR management (TEST) #4732

  • Add GetHostedWindow #4706
  • [X] remove RegisterSourceInfo from Xamlc #4710
    area/Xaml </>
  • [X] use TypeRefComparer for finding converters #4713
    area/Xaml </>
  • Essentials.Battery refactored to interface and singleton #4629
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Refactor Share to use an interface #4674
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Update current .NET MAUI version in bug issue template #4718
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Remove storage read from essentials android - file/media picker #4697
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Refactor Accelerometer into an interface #4630
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Shapes Handlers #4472
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Renaming public APIs Native --> Platform #4599
    area/architecture
  • Refactor SemanticScreenReader to use an interface #4673
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4708
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [ci] Try to install the android image #4691
    platform/android 🤖, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ci] Add retryCountOnTaskFailure #4707
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Initial work to get unpackaged WinUI apps #4460
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Some optimization to speed up device test discovery #4698
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • SDK gone after update from 6.0.1 to 6.0.2 (through Windows update) #13210

Updated

  • Global dotnet tool install not finding global tools after installation on Linux with SDK installed #7069
  • Enable packages for Mariner 2.0 #13231
  • Installing the 6.0.2 ref pack MSI removes the 6.0.0 ref pack MSI #13237

PullRequests

Created

  • Adjust handling of reference packages directory #13238
  • Merge 6.0.200 into 6.0.3xx #13236
  • Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/release/6.0.1xx' into 6.0.2xx #13235
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13234

Merged

  • Gather additional smoke test prereqs #13233
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.2xx #13203

Updated

  • Remove template references to previous versions from source-build #13173
  • Remove bootstrapping for CI builds now that we use CentOS7 previously-source-built #13232
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add source-build tests for dotnet format #13207
  • Fix the logic that generates the fallback text file #12790
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.4
